page.title: 03THE CHURCH AT FOBBING
page.content: {THE NORTH DOOR}IS EXTREMLY OLD AND HAS LARGE IRON STRAP HINGES ABOUT 600 HUNDRED YEARS OLD. IT IS THOUGHT THAT THE HINGES WERE MADE LOCALLY BY THE {VILLAGE BLACKSMITH. OVER THE{SOUTH DOOR}THERE IS A ROYAL COAT OF ARMS, BELONGING TO{KING GEORGE {IV.}THIS ORIGINALLY HUNG INSIDE THE CHURCH. THE{OLDEST GRAVESTONE}IS DATED 1730. THERE ARE MANY OLD GRAVES IN THE GRAVEYARD. EVERY YEAR A{FLOWER FESTIVAL}IS HELD IN THE CHURCH.THE CHURCH INSIDE AND OUT IS DECORATED WITH BEAUTIFUL FLOWER ARRANGEMENTS.
